Uses of Package
org.springframework.messaging.tcp.reactor

  • Packages that use org.springframework.messaging.tcp.reactor 
    Package Description
    org.springframework.messaging.simp.stomp
    Generic support for simple messaging protocols (like STOMP).
    org.springframework.messaging.tcp.reactor
    Contains support for TCP messaging based on Reactor.
  • Classes in org.springframework.messaging.tcp.reactor used by org.springframework.messaging.simp.stomp 
    Class and Description
    AbstractNioBufferReactorNettyCodec
    Convenient base class for ReactorNettyCodec implementations that need to work with NIO ByteBuffers.
    ReactorNettyCodec
    Simple holder for a decoding Function and an encoding BiConsumer to use with Reactor Netty.
  • Classes in org.springframework.messaging.tcp.reactor used by org.springframework.messaging.tcp.reactor 
    Class and Description
    ReactorNettyCodec
    Simple holder for a decoding Function and an encoding BiConsumer to use with Reactor Netty.
